Name: Chin Jian Jie
Matric Number: A175894

//PseudoCode for Task 2//
1.include the stdio.h
2.construct a recursive function with the parameter of 2 output a and b
3.apply the gcd algorithm within the recursive function
4.if the b is 0 , then return a 
5.else return back the function to make recursion.
6.create a main function to run the program
7.create a scanner for the user input a and b.
8.Finally create a output with all the parameter a , b and also the return value of the function.
